archdesc.scopecontent: Photo of meetinghouse of the First German Evangelical Society of Scio, Mich., predecessor of Bethlehem United Church of Christ, Ann Arbor, Mich. The church, founded in 1833, was also known as Zion Church. The building pictured was not used after about 1850. Standing, left to right: Mrs. Sophie Hutzel, Rev. John Neumann, Emanuel Mann, David Allmendinger. Seated, left to right: John Jacob Schaffer, Pauline Allmendinger, Mrs. David Allmendinger, Mrs. David Allmendinger, Sr., Herman [Allmendinger? grandson], Caroline Shaffer, Mrs. William Guenther and daughter Lydia.
